company.name: Stripe
company.description: Stripe is a suite of APIs powering online payment processing and commerce solutions for internet businesses of all sizes. Accept payments and scale faster with AI.
company.headquarters: South San Francisco, California, U.S. and Dublin, Ireland

competitors.name: Adyen
competitors.description: Adyen is a global payment company offering businesses an end-to-end infrastructure delivering frictionless payments across online, mobile, and in-store channels.

competitors.name: PayPal
competitors.description: PayPal is a global online payment system that supports online money transfers and serves as an electronic alternative to traditional paper methods like checks and money orders.

competitors.name: Square
competitors.description: Square provides payment and point-of-sale solutions for businesses of all sizes, enabling them to accept card payments and manage their business operations.

competitors.name: Matchmove
competitors.description: Matchmove is a payment technology company that provides a platform for digital payments and financial services.

competitors.name: EBANX
competitors.description: EBANX is a payment processing company focused on enabling global businesses to accept payments from emerging markets, particularly in Latin America.
